thread.title: Fifitrixiebele

author: Fifitrixiebele
title: Fifitrixiebele
text: This was my first time using TrustedHousesitters, having previously relied on neighbours to look after my cats when I away. I admit I was initially a little apprehensive about handing over my house and the care of my cats to someone I did not know for a couple of weeks. However, any fears were soon allayed when I met my sitter. She has just finished sitting for me for a couple of weeks and she has been brilliant, sending me regular photos and updates on my cats. The site works really well and is a great solution for anyone who worries about leaving their pets and burdening neighbours with feeding favours!
